name: ChunHyang
게임 초기: The road to Hanyang is long. It seems like it will be a journey of a lifetime.
english: The road to Hanyang is far. It seems like it will be long journey.
How did you become a ghost?
About the person who you want to meet

게임 초기: 음... 그게 말이죠… \n백마산에서 조금 남쪽에 있는 공동묘지 지역이에요.
english: Well... It's the area of the communal cemetery, a little south of Baekma Mountain.

게임 초기: ... 네, 한양에서 좀 더 멀어진 곳이에요.
english: ... Yes, it's a bit farther from Hanyang.

게임 초기: 백마산에서 당신을 빼내는 과정에서, \n음기가 강한 이곳으로 이끌려 오게 되었나 봐요..
english: It seems like during the process of rescuing you from Baekma Mountain, we ended up being led to this spiritually strong place...

게임 초기: ... 뭐, 죽는 것보단 여행길이 멀어진 게 낫죠! \n불평하기 없기예요!
english: ... Well, it's better to have a long journey than being dead! \nDon't complaints!

게임 초기: ... 제가 죽던 날의 기억은 떠올리고 싶지 않네요.
english: ... I don't want to recall the memories of the day I died.

게임 초기: 욕심에 눈이 먼 사또에게 죽임을 당했다... \n정도로만 말씀드릴게요.
english: In short, I was killed by the village magistrate, blinded by his own greed.

게임 초기: 아주 명석하셔서 큰 뜻을 품으신 분이면서도, \n높고 낮음에 연연치 않고 사람을 대하는 올곧은 분이죠.
english: He is incredibly intelligent, carrying great aspirations, and treat people with fairness regardless of their status.

게임 초기: 바라만 보아도 사람 좋게 만드는 분이시지만....
english: Just the mere thought of him makes feel good...

게임 초기: 전 이제 사람으로서 그분을 볼 순 없게 되었네요...
english: But now, my human feelings are meaningless
